name: Account Score
description: A feature which enables account scoring based on custom contact level attributes.

name: Account Transfer Tool
description: A feature which enables the transfer of an account from one user to another when responsibilities change.

name: Activity Log
description: A feature which allows you to view the list of actions performed by users.

name: Address Management
description: A feature which allows you to add or edit addresses within the application.

name: Approval Process Control
description: A feature which provides visibility about an item's status.

name: Customizable Subscriptions
description: A feature which allows you to customize a user's subscription model.

name: Daily Limit
description: A feature to specify the maximum number of hours per day that you would like a team member to work on a given project or task.

name: Dashboard Guests
description: A feature to invite people outside of your workspace to view real-time project information via an external dashboard.

name: Live Chat Summary
description: A feature which provides you a bird's eye view of your live chat channel.

name: Proposal Generation
description: A feature for automating your proposal generation process and making it entirely customizable.

name: Remote Administration
description: A feature which allows you to manage systems and team remotely.

name: Roles and Permissions
description: A feature which allows you to manage systems and team remotely.

name: Service Specific Settings
description: A feature to enable tailored service settings for different users.
